definition: to get round fast/to spread like wildfire
(negative prefix)/not/no
lower part of leg
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
to walk/to go/to run/to move (of vehicle)/to visit/to leave/to go away/to die (euph.)/from/through/away (in compound verbs, such as 撤走[che4 zou3])/to change (shape, form, meaning)

sentences.english: Wan brothers film animation news spread like wildfire.
sentences.chinese: 萬氏兄弟拍攝動畫影片的消息，不脛而走。

sentences.english: The news was passed on by word of mouth.
sentences.chinese: 衆口相傳，消息不脛而走。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, news of what she has done has spread far beyond Riceville.
sentences.chinese: 事的消息不脛而走，遠遠地傳出了賴斯維爾鎮以外。

sentences.english: News is flying about concerning a royal wedding.
sentences.chinese: 有關皇室婚禮的消息不脛而走。

sentences.english: News travels fast, especially juicy news.
sentences.chinese: 消息會不脛而走，特別是八卦新聞。

sentences.english: Thereupon, the view which falls ill about the LiHunan disappears without a trace.
sentences.chinese: 於是，關於李湘生病的說法不脛而走。

sentences.english: The news swept through the firm.
sentences.chinese: 這消息在公司中不脛而走。

sentences.english: This idea spread like wildfire, the team reached the branch secretary in the spring of your ears.
sentences.chinese: 這想法不脛而走，傳到該隊黨支部書記於春貴耳朵裏。

definition: to discuss spiritedly (idiom)/tongues are wagging
lit. to return the jade annulus to Zhao (idiom); fig. to return something intact to its rightful owner
Guoxing or Kuohsing township in Nantou county 南投縣|南投县[Nan2 tou2 xian4], central Taiwan
Tiandihui (Chinese fraternal organization)
secret meeting/to meet secretly
to spread/to hand down/to disseminate
Zhou Ji (1781-1839), Qing writer and poet
help to the needy/emergency relief/charity/to give to poorer relative/(also 賙濟|赒济)
Hundred Days Reform (1898), failed attempt to reform the Qing dynasty
ironclad evidence/conclusive proof
Zhang Juzheng (1525-1582), Grand Secretary during the Ming dynasty, credited with bringing the dynasty to its apogee
to act in collusion (idiom); in cahoots with/villains will look after one another
Taichung or Taizhong county in central Taiwan
to set a trap
title/official appellation
to write for sb else/a lawyer who writes legal documents for his clients
Liuying township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
